channel.title: New user help
channel.description:
i know this is a stupid probem mostlikly my own ignorence but im unable to launch the game past the ip setup
[url=http://postimg.org/image/5ryd6y6id/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/5ryd6y6id/Untitled.jpg[/img][/url]
any1 willing to tell me directly or link a fix

item.title: New user help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ronove360, post:4, topic:546828”]i really dont care if it is outdated, i just want to play offline on my own server as i really dislike the comunity on leget servers, i dont even care if its patched upto dungeoneering

so yes offline/local 127.0.0.1 is what i wanted and this is the cliant segested to me by the xpg community[/quote]

You still want to get an updated client… You don’t have to get one with all the bells and whistles and all the new features…
But the newer clients have renamed code (because the client is decompiled from RuneScape…).
So instead of getting a client with 45 files all named
Class1
Class2
Class3
Class4
And so on, you want an updated one. They may not haveall the code renamed, nor will they be perfect. But they are, in fact, better than what you’re using.

If you want a recommendation, Get Asteria 2.0 by lare96.
And then a client: This one. You will need to get the whole package, and then just take the client from it
Note: You will need to enable RSA client sided, or remove it server sided.
How to enable RSA

Read full topic

item.title: New user help
item.dc:creator: @ronove360 ronove360
item.description:
@ronove360 wrote:

i really dont care if it is outdated, i just want to play offline on my own server as i really dislike the comunity on leget servers, i dont even care if its patched upto dungeoneering

so yes offline/local 127.0.0.1 is what i wanted and this is the cliant segested to me by the xpg community

all i know is that it continusly says im already loged in and this error “Couldn’t open output stream to log file” seems to pop every time i try, and the onlything in the file says run, loging (any name), and enjoy

im the furthist thing for even a novice coder so i dont want to mess around and potentaly screwing somthing up

Read full topic

item.title: New user help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

To be honest, while it was good at the time, the mopar client is very, very outdated, and I don’t see any server using it anymore (though someone still might). You might want to take a look in the Downloads section to find a more updated server and client.

I can’t directly see an issue from the picture provided, and you also haven’t gave us much of a description on what you’re trying to do.
If you could explain it a bit better, it may help.

Read full topic
